title: Can someone identify this tree?
selftext: Pls give me Hindi or English name?
comments: inst this ber? atleast that's what I call it
Ber tree and in our Gujarat it's called bavad
Yeah I can identify him, his name is Fred.
Yep it checks out, it’s a tree!
Ber and if you need to identify plants and trees you can also use Google image search.
Ber. but that tree identifies as Mango. (Your title) lol
My neighbour just gave me a bag full of ber .... Let them turn brownish it taste really good

Looks like ber

The fruit is popular but I think it stinks
usko khana mat bhai, ped me kutte su karke chale jaate hai un par

Indian Jujube. We make pickle out of it https://www.thenortheaststore.com/jujube-sweet-pickle-bogori-assar 

there are different varieties of it. Some are sweet, some are sour. 
Don't eat it raw too much, you will catch dry cough
Yes I can identify this is definitely a tree
